Package org.spotify.operations

Class RadioOperations

java.lang.Object
org.spotify.operations.RadioOperations
All Implemented Interfaces:
Operation
public class RadioOperations extends Object implements Operation
Provides operations for managing radio stations.

This class allows for adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving radio stations through interactions with the Service interface. The radio stations include attributes such as city, country, radio name, and URL.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mukhammed Lolo

  • Method Details

    • addOperation

      public void addOperation()
      Adds a new radio station.

      This method collects the necessary details from the user, creates a new Radio object, and saves it using the Service.save(Object) method.

      Specified by:
      addOperation in interface Operation

    • updateOperation

      public void updateOperation()
      Updates an existing radio station.

      This method prompts the user to enter the radio station's ID, retrieves the existing radio station, allows the user to modify its details, and updates it using the Service.update(Object) method.

      Specified by:
      updateOperation in interface Operation

    • deleteOperation

      public void deleteOperation()
      Deletes a radio station.

      This method prompts the user to enter the radio station's ID and deletes the corresponding radio station using the Service.delete(Long) (id)} method.

      Specified by:
      deleteOperation in interface Operation

    • findAllOperations

      public void findAllOperations()
      Retrieves and displays all radio stations.

      This method fetches all radio stations using the Service.findAll() method and prints their details.

      Specified by:
      findAllOperations in interface Operation

    • findByIdOperation

      public void findByIdOperation()
      Retrieves and displays a radio station by its ID.

      This method prompts the user for the radio station's ID, fetches the radio station using the Service.findById(Long) method, and prints its details.

      Specified by:
      findByIdOperation in interface Operation
